problem_text_cn: 如图,把面积分别为9与16的两个等边三角形重叠,得到的两个阴影部分的面积分别为a与b(a＜b),则b-a等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the two equilateral triangles with areas N_0 and N_1 are overlapped, and the areas of the two shaded parts obtained are a and b (a<b), then b-a is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:设空白部分的面积为s,∵两三角形的面积分别为9,16,两个阴影部分的面积分别为a与b(a＜b),∴a=9-s,b=16-s,∴b-a=(16-s)-(9-s)=16-s-9+s=7．故选:A．
